sponsor: Institute of Vaccines and Medical Biologicals, Vietnam
briefTitle: A Safety and Immunogenicity Study of IVACFLU-A/H5N1
officialTitle: A Phase 2/3 Double Blinded, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Study in Healthy Adult Volunteers in Vietnam to Examine the Safety and Immunogenicity of an Inactivated A/H5N1 Influenza Vaccine (IVACFLU-A/H5N1) Produced by IVAC
summary: The study hypothesis was that two 0.5 mL doses of whole virion monovalent A/H5N1 influenza vaccine (IVACFLU-A/H5N1) adjuvanted with alum would be safe and well tolerated in healthy adults, and that at least one of the two doses tested would be immunogenic in 60% or more of the subjects tested.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number and Percentage of Subjects Achieving a Hemagglutination Inhibition (HAI) Titer of â‰¥1:40
